data.text:
Detailed Solution

Download Solution PDF

The correct answer is Oslo.Key Points

The Nobel Peace Prize ceremony takes place in Oslo in Norway, while the other prize ceremonies take place annually in Stockholm, Sweden.

It is one of the five Nobel prizes presented in the fields of Literature, Physics, Chemistry, Physiology or Medicine, and Peace.

The Nobel Peace Prize has been awarded 99 times to 133 Nobel Laureates between 1901 and 2018.

Denis Mukwege Mukengere, Nadia Murad - 2018 winners. 1901 - First Nobel Peace Prize awarded to Jean Henry Dunant and Frederic Passy.
